Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Laezel meets Vlaaktih as a hologram. Avatar can decide if she accepts her orders to kill the prisoner or refuse. In both cases, the planecaster is activated.If you refuse, Vlaakith orders the inquisitor if alive to kill you if you try to exit the room or theatens to hunt you down if he's already dead. Orphan Laezel automatically accepts Vlaakith's orders.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: Trigger the Vlaakith dialog after speaking to the Templar or after killing him with Avatar Laezel or Orphaned Laezel.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM.synopsis: Vlaaktih appears as a hologram and Laezel meets her for the first time. Avatar can decide if she accepts her orders to kill the prisoner or refuse. In both cases, the planecaster is activated.If you refuse, Vlaakith orders the inquisitor if alive to kill you if you try to exit the room or theatens to hunt you down if he's already dead. If Laezel is not yet convinced to side with the player, they have a chance to do it here if they refuse.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM.how_to_trigger: Go to 1357; 0; -785 in CRE_Main_A. Enter the captain's office, and go thorugh the dialogs as you want. Go to the Security office with Lae'zel in the party.Go through the Inquisitor dialog and show the artefact, or kill the inquisitor. This dialog automatically triggers afterwards.

Betrayal_OM_Laezel_COM.synopsis: Companion Laezel finds out that Vlaakith had ordered her death regardless of what happened when she returned. This is a big moment of betrayal for her.
Betrayal_OM_Laezel_COM.how_to_trigger: Return from the Astral Prison with Companion Laezel without having killed the Inquisitor before you entered. Plays automatically when you come back.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_13.text: Inquisitor W'wargaz was potent. We are impressed.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of player reacting to hearing a disembodied voice.NodeContext: Vlaakith should sligjhtly overpronounce every word, think Davros from Doctor Who, each syllable drips with a kind of mad, ancient evil

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_0.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The planecaster vibrates, shaking the ground around it. 
Flares of light curl up in its centre and grow to full form. 
Vlaakith appears, awesome and terrible, at least twice the size of any human, a hologram in a haze of astral flares.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_78.speaker: Narrator
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_78.text: *The goddess of your kin. The Queen of the Astral, the stillest of Seas. Vlaakith has risen.*

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Inquisitor kneels before Vlaakith's image, surprised to see her. All of his staff kneel also. NodeContext: pronounced VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI (meaning 'For the honour of Vlaakith!')

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_65.text: You are permitted to look upon me. You are invited to kneel.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_83.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_83.text: Kneel in reverence to your queen.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_14.text: Stay standing, exactly as you are.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_61.text: My queen. You honour me with your presence.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_86.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_86.text: To honour me is to obey me. On your knees.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_59.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_27.text: You walk a fine line, child. Tread carefully lest you fall.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_56.text: You bear that which is mine. I presume you have come to return it. Lae'zel.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_28.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_28.text: You know me. How can it be?

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_71.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_71.text: Urlon of K'liir speaks most highly. As did Al'chaia before him.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_71.context: NodeContext: UR-lawn | al-KYE-uh with a gutteral 'k'

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_85.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_85.text: You seek purity. I may yet grant it.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_77.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_77.text: I am at your command, my Queen. The artefact is yours.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_49.text: Extend your fealty one step further, and you will be rewarded.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_25.text: That 'weapon' you carry - the Astral Prism - it is corrupted.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith summons a floating hologram of the artefact and psionically spins it, toying with it.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_79.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_79.text: I shall cleanse it for you, my Queen. Tell me how.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_79.context: CinematicNodeContext: W'wargaz appeals to his queen, desperate to be given this twisted honour

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_37.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_37.context: CinematicNodeContext: After he is rebuked, W'wargaz stands sulkily behind the player

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_23.text: There is someone inside. Their mind is warped, broken - a blight.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_34.text: They are an agent of the Grand Design. Sent to sabotage the Astral Prism - our last defence against the return of the Illithid Empire.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_2.text: As long as they live, the Prism is compromised.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_67.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_67.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_80.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_80.text: Do this, and I will cleanse you. Do this -

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_20.text: As you say, my Queen. I will slay the Prism's occupant.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looks the player over, and gives a ghastly, frightening smile.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_84.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_84.text: Use the planecaster's power to enter the artefact.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_57.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_57.text: Be wary of the creature's lying tongue. Cut it out, if you must.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_53.text: W'wargaz. She will not leave this room until it is done.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_60.text: Lae'zel - reject me and be undone. Serve, and we feast in Tu'narath together.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_18.text: Do not leave this room before it is done, or I will undo you - you will be your queen's child no longer.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_4.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_4.text: Do as I say, and we feast in Tu'narath together.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_87.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_87.text: I can't do that. The person inside protects me from the Absolute.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_31.text: You will do your duty - or be githyanki no longer.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_38.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_38.text: No. I am not your servant to be commanded on whim.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_10.text: Insolent child. You are my subject. My word is law.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_39.text: The god-queen of my people cannot kill someone herself?

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_6.text: Perhaps I misheard. You would not speak ill of a god. Would you?
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_6.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_7.text: I spoke too hastily - please forgive me.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_41.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_41.text: I just think a real god could kill whoever she wants.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_45.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_45.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_55.text: I will not give it to you. This artefact is mine by rights.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_66.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_66.text: No. It is not. To own something is to know it.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_42.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. You know me.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_42.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith - Vlaakith's will above all

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_76.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_76.text: I shall cleanse it for you, my Queen. Tell me how.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_89.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_89.text: Ascension? My queen. An honour gained, a burden borne. I will not waste a second.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_72.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_AOM_OOM_72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of player reacting to hearing a disembodied voice. NodeContext: Vlaakith should sligjhtly overpronounce every word, think Davros from Doctor Who, each syllable drips with a kind of mad, ancient evil

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_125.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The planecaster vibrates, shaking the ground around it. 
Flares of light curl up in its centre and grow to full form. 
Vlaakith appears, awesome and terrible, at least twice the size of any human, a hologram in a haze of astral flares.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_69.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_69.context: CinematicNodeContext: The Inquisitor kneels before Vlaakith's image, surprised to see her. All of his staff kneel also. NodeContext: pronounced VLAH-kith gawg shkaath ZAI (meaning 'For the honour of Vlaakith!')

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_100.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel kneelsNodeContext: shkaath ZAI - for the honour!

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_59.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_59.text: You are permitted to look upon me. You are invited to kneel.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_106.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_106.text: The Deathless Queen has spoken. You will obey.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel grimaces in anger, but remains silent

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_86.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_86.context: NodeContext: her facade splinters a little, letting her mad, immortal rage take over

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_89.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_89.text: I am Vlaakith. Undying Queen of the noble githyanki. God Regent of the Six Arms of Tu'narath.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_89.context: NodeContext: anger should build rhythmically here, each consonant semi-spat in rage

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith gains her composure and motions everyone to rise. Everyone present rises.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_40.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_40.text: Stay standing, exactly as you are.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player waves politely at Vlaakith.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_80.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_80.text: Did your crèche teach you nothing?
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_80.context: InternalNodeContext: The Inquisitor hisses at the player while kneeling.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_32.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_32.text: I expected little of istik education, but here we kneel before our Queen.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith, unfazed in the least, motions everyone present to rise.l Everyone rises.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_24.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player kneels, head bowed, solemn, appropriate. Vlaakith offers something resembling a smile, and gestures for the player to rise. Everyone present rises.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looms in to face Lae'zel at their eye level.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_61.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_61.text: Your choice of allies is most vexing. They do not become you. Lae'zel.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_8.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_8.text: These attendants you keep - you taught them well. My child. My Lae'zel.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_67.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_67.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. You know me.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_67.context: NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith - Vlaakith's will above all

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_126.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_126.text: Urlon of K'liir speaks most highly. As did Al'chaia before him.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_126.context: NodeContext: UR-lawn | al-KYE-uh with a gutteral 'k'

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_38.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_38.text: You seek purity. I may yet grant it.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith turns to player and looms over them instead.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_127.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_127.text: Child of Gith. You carry what is mine. Do I call you loyal servant - or thief?
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_127.context: NodeContext: Yank = child. YAHNK to avoid sounding like she's calling the player an American

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_75.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_75.text: Istik. You bear that which is ours. But are you friend, or are you thief?

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_14.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_14.text: I didn't take the weapon from you, but I am returning it.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_98.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_98.text: An unexpected servant. Your will is strong.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_39.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_39.text: Your kind's stoic endurance will be a boon to our cause.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_53.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_53.text: Your kind's heritage is long and storied. It is an honour to be served by one so noble.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_114.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_114.text: Your kind is not known for trusting strangers. Quite rightly. Yet here you are.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_31.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_31.text: You have ventured far from your kind's comforts to serve us.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_72.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_72.text: Extend your fealty one step further, and you will be rewarded beyond your mortal reckoning.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_43.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_43.text: Descendant of noble dragons - you honour us with your allyship.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_91.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_91.text: Your kind will go far for glory. As you have shown by being here.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_58.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_58.text: My child. You walk on the path of ascension.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_105.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_105.text: I'm the hero who found your weapon.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_10.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_10.text: Your utility is proven. But your heroism is yet to be witnessed.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_22.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_22.text: A test, then, to see if you are as capable as you profess to be.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_82.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_82.text: That 'weapon' you carry - the Astral Prism - it is corrupted.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_82.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith summons a floating hologram of the artefact and psionically spins it, toying with it.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_21.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_21.text: I will cleanse it for you, my Queen. Tell me how.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_57.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_57.text: There is someone inside. Their mind is warped, broken - a blight.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_15.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_15.text: They are an agent of the Grand Design. Sent to sabotage the Astral Prism - our last defence against the return of the Illithid Empire.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_122.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_122.text: As long as they live, the Prism is compromised.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_33.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_33.context: CinematicNodeContext: With a close of her fist, the artefact hologram is shattered in mid-air in a burst of astral flare.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_3.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_3.text: Do this, and I will cleanse you and your allies. Do this -
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith turns to Lae'zel at the end of the statement.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_90.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_90.text: Ascension? My queen. An honour gained, a burden borne.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_11.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_11.text: Choose. But know this: the cost of refusal is great.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_73.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_73.text: I can't do that. The person inside protects me from the Absolute.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_88.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_88.context: CinematicNodeContext: The room rumbles, the gith (and inquisitor) in here look terrifiedNodeContext: she loses herself a bit in rage here,

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_96.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_96.text: Tsk'va. Do not defy my queen!
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_96.context: NodeContext: Lae'zel panicked and angry that you have spoken against the queen to her face

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_27.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_27.text: Yes. I will enter the Prism and kill the occupant.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith looks the player over, and gives a ghastly, frightening smile.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_103.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_103.text: No. In fact, maybe I'll free the one inside.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_111.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_111.text: Hshar'lak! You would stand against me?

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_62.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_62.text: W'wargaz - see that my orders are followed. If not -
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_62.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_5.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_5.text: - eliminate them and enter the Prism yourself. See that protocol is done.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_18.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_18.text: Use this to enter the Prism, or deny me. The choice, as ever, is yours.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_28.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_28.text: But know this: my wrath is carried with each of my faithful. It will find you.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_26.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_26.text: Vlaakith's eyes see beyond the planes. We cannot hide.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_130.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_130.text: To refuse Vlaakith is to refuse me. You will do as she asks. Or I will be her wrath.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_7.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_7.text: Do what you deem right. I plan to do the same.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_123.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_123.text: I will wait here, and you will not leave this room except to enter the Prism. Turn your back on me, and you will feel my blade against it.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_56.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_56.text: I will wait here. Turn your back, and you will feel my blade against it.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_55.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_55.text: All we've seen, all we've done, and you would abandon me?

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_49.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_49.text: You know where my fealty lies. You have always known.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_34.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_34.text: Follow my lead. You need to trust me, whatever comes next.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_50.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_50.text: Very well - my trust is yours. But it is fragile. Break it, and be broken.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_117.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_117.text: Come - we must enter the Prism. Its secrets are finally ours to know.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_118.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_118.text: If you're a god, do it yourself.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_12.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_12.text: I will do as you wish.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_48.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_48.text: It is my greatest honour to obey.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_45.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_45.text: No. I am not doing the githyanki queen's bidding.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_9.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_9.text: Can't you kill them yourself? I thought 'gods' were all-powerful.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_95.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_95.text: Perhaps I misheard. You would not speak ill of a god. Would you?
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_95.context: NodeContext: again, she's close to losing it a bit here, "would you" said with max venom

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_66.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_66.text: Do not test her. She will be our ruin.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_77.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_77.text: I spoke too hastily - please forgive me.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: The image of Vlaakith flickers away within the planecaster, replaced by an image of the artefact suspended above the device.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_47.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_47.text: Use the planecaster's power to enter the artefact.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_70.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_70.text: Be wary of the creature's lying tongue. Cut it out, if you must.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_65.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_65.text: W'wargaz. They are not to leave until it is done.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_35.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_35.text: Ba na'zin. Our each step, with purpose.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith and the hologram disappear after Lae'zel's response.NodeContext: bah na-ZIN - I seek truth

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_71.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_71.text: Vlaakith has spoken. Do not leave this room except to enter the Prism. Turn your back on me, and you will feel my blade against it.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_63.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_63.text: Ch'mar, zal'a Vlaakith. We will not waste a second.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith and the hologram disappear after Lae'zel's response.NodeContext: cheh-MAR ZAL-ah VLAH-kith - Vlaakith's will above all

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_124.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_124.text: You will not leave this room until it is done.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_115.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_115.text: I just think a real god could kill whoever she wants.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_120.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_120.context: CinematicNodeContext: at the word "wish", Vlaakith invokes the most powerful, reality-bending magic of the multiverse. The Wish. her image shakes, as does the room around the players. we cut to gameplay, and they die .

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_119.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_119.text: The god-queen of my people cannot kill someone herself?

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_42.speaker: Lae'zel
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_42.text: You must accept. Refuse, and you will know my fury.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_108.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_108.text: Neither. It is mine by rights.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_109.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_109.text: No. It is not 'yours'. To own something is to know it.
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_109.context: CinematicNodeContext: Vlaakith returns to her full posture.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_113.speaker: Player
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_113.text: I am at your command, my Queen. The artefact is yours.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_97.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_97.text: Extend your fealty one step further, and you will be rewarded beyond your mortal reckoning.

Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_46.speaker: Vlaakith
Vlaakith_OM_Laezel_COM_46.text: Inquisitor W'wargaz was potent. We are impressed.

Betrayal_OM_Laezel_COM_4.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
Betrayal_OM_Laezel_COM_4.text: You are named Hshar'lak. Bend your head, for my blade is ready.

Betrayal_OM_Laezel_COM_3.speaker: Lae'zel
Betrayal_OM_Laezel_COM_3.text: Ch'r'ai, please, summon Vlaakith! There's much -

Betrayal_OM_Laezel_COM_0.speaker: Ch'r'ai W'wargaz
Betrayal_OM_Laezel_COM_0.text: Irrelevant, ghaik wretch. The queen has spoken - your death is decreed.

Betrayal_OM_Laezel_COM_2.speaker: Narrator
Betrayal_OM_Laezel_COM_2.text: *You realise what Lae'zel doesn't: whatever the outcome of your visit to the Astral Prism, Vlaakith had no intention of letting either of you live.*
